acid splash.description: You hurl a bubble of acid at {}|You throw a bubble of acid at {}
acid splash.description_second: {} hurls a bubble of acid at {}

shocking grasp.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to {}|A bolt of lightning from your hand shocks {}
shocking grasp.description_second: {} fires lightning from their hand at {}

vicious mockery.description: You unleash a string of insults at {}|You hurl a string of insults at {}
vicious mockery.description_second: {} unleashes a string of insults at {}|{} hurls a string of insults at {}

animal friendship.description: You convince {} that you mean no harm
animal friendship.description_second: {} convinces {} that they mean no harm

witch bolt.description: You fire a bolt of lighning at {}
witch bolt.description_second: {} fires a bolt of lightning at {}

chaos bolt.description: You fire a mass of chaotic energy at {}
chaos bolt.description_second: {} fires a mass of chaotic energy at {}

cat nap.description: {} feels drowsy|{} is sleepy|{} begins to snore|{} yawns
cat nap.actionDescription: You struggle to stay awake.|You feel very sleepy.|You feel tired.|Lethargy overcomes you.

hideous laughter.description: {} giggles|{} laughs hysterically|{} rolls on the floor laughing|{} finds everything funny|{} bursts into laughter
hideous laughter.actionDescription: Every movement that you attempt to make seems hillarious.|You laugh uncontrollably.|You roll on the floor laughing.|You cackle hysterically.

frozen asset.description: {} is surrounded by an icy haze|{} is surrounded by an icy mist
frozen asset.actionDescription: You try to move but find yourself surrounded by a barrier of ice|You try to move but are frozen|You attempt to move but a cold mist deadens your limbs

magic missile.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force which simultaneously strike {}
magic missile.description_second: {} created three glowing darts of magical force which simultaneously strike {}

burning hands.description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips and hits {}
burning hands.description_second: {} threw a thin sheet of flames from their hands at {}

magic shield.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

acid arrow.description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward {} and bursts in a spray of acid
acid arrow.description_second: {} fires a shimmering green arrow toward {} and it bursts in a spray of acid

aid.description: Your spell bolsters {} with toughness and resolve|You cast a protective spell on {}
aid.description_second: {} casts a spell bolstering {} with toughness and resolve
